unit.utterance: Xob dāstāne film injuri bud ke
unit.utterance_translation: Well, the story begins

unit.utterance: yek bāqbāni dašt mivehā golābi mičid az bālāye deraxt
unit.utterance_translation: a gardner was picking pears on a tree

unit.utterance: bad miyāmad migozāšt inhā rā tuye sabad
unit.utterance_translation: he climbs down the tree and put them in the basket

unit.utterance: yek bār ke rafte bud balāye deraxt dašt golābiha rā mičid
unit.utterance_translation: once he had gone to the on top of the tree, and was picking pears

unit.utterance: az dur nešān dād ke yani tuye film didim ke yek pesar bačei savāre dočarxe āmad
unit.utterance_translation: it was shown from far away, we saw in the film that a boy came on a bike

unit.utterance: va nazdike deraxte hamin baqbāne šod
unit.utterance_translation: and approached the tree which the gardner was on

unit.utterance: ta bāqbān bālāye deraxt bud
unit.utterance_translation: while the gardner was on the tree

unit.utterance: yek dāne az sabade golābihāyi ke čide bud rā gozāšt ruye dočarxe va šuru kard tuye rāh raftan
unit.utterance_translation: he took one of the baskets which had been picked, put it on his bike and set off the road

unit.utterance: bāqbān ham hiči az in sahne čizi nadid
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner didn't notice anything of this scene

unit.utterance: bad pesarbače raft az kenāre yek dočarxeye digari az kenāre yek doxtare dočarxe savāri ke rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: then the boy passed another bike on his way

unit.utterance: dočarxeaš oftād tuye yek dastandāzi
unit.utterance_translation: his bike fell into a pothole

unit.utterance: va zamin xord
unit.utterance_translation: he fell down

unit.utterance: tamāme golābihāyaš ham paxše zamin šodand
unit.utterance_translation: all his pears spilled out

unit.utterance: pā šod xodaš rā tekānd pāyaš rā negāh kard bebinad zaxm šode ya na
unit.utterance_translation: he got up, dusted himself, looked at his foot to see whether it was injured or not

unit.utterance: se tā pesarbačeye digar ān nazdiktar istāde budand beheš āmadand komakaš
unit.utterance_translation: three boys who standing there came to help him

unit.utterance: yek nafar golābihāyaš rā jam kard yeki tekānd lebāsaš rā
unit.utterance_translation: one of them gathered up the pears, the other one cleaned his clothes

unit.utterance: pesarbače savāre dočarxe šod āmad beravad
unit.utterance_translation: the little boy got on his bike again and he was about to go

unit.utterance: ān se nafare digar didand ke kolāhaš rā jā gozāšte
unit.utterance_translation: the other three guys saw the little boy's hat left on the ground

unit.utterance: yekišān āmad kolāhaš rā be pesarbače bedahad
unit.utterance_translation: one of them came to give back the boy's hat

unit.utterance: dar ezāye kolāhi ke beheš dād
unit.utterance_translation: and instead of the hat they gave him

unit.utterance: pesarbače ham se ta golābi beheš bargardānd
unit.utterance_translation: the little boy gave them three pears

unit.utterance: se ta golābi bargardānd va in pesarbačeha xošhāl az inke golābi dastešān rā gerefte šuru kardand hamintor bāzi konan bargaštand raftand samte mazrae
unit.utterance_translation: he gave them three pears, they were really happy and went to the farm while playing

unit.utterance: az ān taraf nešān dād ke bāqbān az deraxt āmad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: on the other hand, the gardner came down the tree

unit.utterance: negāh kard did sabade golābihāyaš yekišān nist
unit.utterance_translation: looked around, and found out one of the baskets was not there

unit.utterance: bad haminjur mānde bud ke did u dāšt bā xodaš fekr mikard ke če etefāqi oftāde
unit.utterance_translation: he was being surprised, while he was wondering what had happend

unit.utterance: ke did se tā pesarbačeha āmadand samtaš
unit.utterance_translation: he saw the boys coming towards him

unit.utterance: dārand golābihā rā mindāzand bālā va gāz mizanand va hamin.
unit.utterance_translation: while playing and eating the pears, and that's it!
